suites.title: Referral Page - View Referral List and Manual Data Sync

cases.title: [Smoke]-Referral List loads successfully with expected columns
cases.description: Verify Referral List loads successfully with expected columns
cases.preconditions: User logged in as Healthcare Admin

steps.expected_result: Referral List table is displayed with all columns: Patient Name,Referral Type, Member ID, Medi-Cal ID, DOB, Sex, Referral Date, Payer, Action

cases.title: [Smoke]-Sync Now button fetches latest referrals
cases.description: Verify Sync Now button fetches latest referrals from Monday.com
cases.preconditions: Referral List tab is open

steps.expected_result: Referral list updates and Last Sync timestamp reflects current time

cases.title: [Smoke]-Patient detail popup appears on clicking a referral row
cases.description: Verify patient detail popup appears on clicking a referral row
cases.preconditions: Referral List is visible with at least one patient row

steps.expected_result: Patient detail modal is displayed with all patient details

cases.title: [Smoke]-Create Patient button is visible if patient does not exist in Healthie
cases.description: Verify Create Patient button is visible if patient does not exist in Healthie
cases.preconditions: Referral row is for a new patient

steps.action: Check Action column for the referral
steps.expected_result: 'Create Patient' button is visible

cases.title: [Smoke]-Successful patient creation
cases.description: Verify patient can be created successfully
cases.preconditions: User is on patient detail popup with Create Patient button available

steps.expected_result: Patient record is created in Healthie and button changes to 'Schedule'

cases.title: [Smoke]-Schedule popup appears after clicking Schedule Appointment
cases.description: Verify Schedule popup appears after clicking Schedule Appointment
cases.preconditions: Patient exists in Healthie and 'Schedule' button is visible

steps.expected_result: Schedule Appointment modal opens with provider list, calendar, and timeslots

cases.title: [Smoke]-Appointment scheduled with valid inputs
cases.description: Verify appointment can be scheduled with valid inputs
cases.preconditions: Schedule Appointment popup is open

steps.action: Select Provider, Date, Time, Contact Type, and Appointment Type and Available Time slots then submit
steps.expected_result: Appointment is scheduled successfully, status updates in Monday.com to 'Scheduled'

cases.title: [Smoke]-Close button dismisses patient detail popup
cases.description: Verify Close button dismisses patient detail popup
cases.preconditions: Patient detail popup is open

steps.expected_result: Patient detail popup is dismissed

cases.title: [Smoke]-Verify all appointment types are available in dropdown
cases.description: Verify all appointment types are available in dropdown
cases.preconditions: Schedule Appointment popup is open

steps.expected_result: Dropdown lists all expected appointment types (NP Initial Assessment, NP Follow-up, NP Follow-up(Transfer and Interpreter required, MD Initial, MD Follow-up, etc.)

cases.title: [Smoke] Open patient details popup on row click
cases.description: Verify that clicking a referral row shows patient details in a popup
cases.preconditions: 1. Referral data is visible

steps.expected_result: Patient details popup is displayed with relevant information

cases.title: [Smoke]-Referral List loads successfully with expected filter options
cases.description: Ensuring that Referral List page contains all the expected filter options of search bar & filter drop down
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Observe the filter options above patient details list
steps.expected_result: "Referral List" page must be opened with "Select by patient name" search bar, "Select Referral Type", "Select Payer" & "Select date range" filter drop down.

cases.title: [Smoke]-Verify all Referral Types are available in drop down
cases.description: Verifying that all Referral Types namely "Therapy", "Medication", "Therapy & Medication" are present in "Select Referral Type" dropdown
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down

steps.expected_result: "Select Referral Type" filter drop down must contain options of "Therapy", "Medication", "Therapy & Medication" in sequential manner.

cases.title: [Functional] Display referral list with correct columns
cases.description: Verify that the referral list displays all required columns fetched from Monday.com
cases.preconditions:
1. Admin is logged in
2. Sync is completed or cron has run

steps.action: Navigate to the Referral List tab
steps.expected_result: Referral list displays: Patient Name, Referral Type, Member ID, Medi-Cal ID, DOB, Sex, Referral Date, Referral Type, Payer, Action

steps.action: Observe the table headers and rows

cases.title: [Functional] Create Patient button appears for new referrals
cases.description: Verify that the 'Create Patient' button is displayed when the patient does not exist in Healthie
cases.preconditions:
1. Referral data exists
2. Patient is not created in Healthie

steps.expected_result: 'Create Patient' button is visible

cases.title: [Functional] Schedule button appears for existing patients
cases.description: Ensure that 'Schedule' appears for patients already created in Healthie
cases.preconditions:
1. Referral data exists
2. Patient is already created in Healthie

steps.expected_result: 'Schedule' button is visible

cases.title: [Functional] Open patient details popup on row click
cases.description: Verify that clicking a referral row shows patient details in a popup
cases.preconditions: 1. Referral data is visible

steps.expected_result: Patient details popup is displayed with relevant information

cases.title: [Functional] Schedule Appointment with provider and time slot
cases.description: Verify scheduling modal allows selecting provider, date, time, contact and appointment type
cases.preconditions:
1. Patient already exists
2. Schedule button is available

steps.expected_result: Appointment is created in Healthie

steps.action: Select contact type and appointment type

cases.title: [Negative] Fail to create patient if required fields are missing
cases.description: Check behavior when patient creation is attempted with missing mandatory fields
cases.preconditions:
1. Referral with incomplete data
2. 'Create Patient' is clicked

steps.expected_result: Error message is shown, patient not created

cases.title: [Integration] Sync Now updates referral list from Monday.com
cases.description: Ensure clicking 'Sync Now' pulls latest referrals from Monday.com
cases.preconditions:
1. Admin is logged in
2. Sync Now button is visible

steps.expected_result: Referral list updates with new records from Monday.com

cases.title: [Edge] No referral data returns empty table message
cases.description: Verify proper messaging when no referrals are available from Monday.com
cases.preconditions:
1. No referrals in Monday.com
2. Sync is performed

steps.expected_result: Message displayed: 'No referrals found'

cases.title: [UI/UX] Verify 'Last Sync' timestamp and Sync Now button
cases.description: Ensure that last sync timestamp is correctly shown with a working Sync Now button
cases.preconditions:
1. Admin is logged in
2. Referral list tab is open

steps.expected_result: 'Last Sync' updates correctly; button triggers data fetch

cases.title: [Integration] Verify daily cron job runs at 5:30 AM PST/PDT
cases.description: Confirm that referral list is auto-updated via cron job daily at 5:30 AM
cases.preconditions:
1. Cron job is configured
2. Time is past 5:30 AM PST/PDT

steps.expected_result: Referral list reflects latest data post cron run

cases.title: Referral Type column > type of referrals in column
cases.description: Ensuring that Referral Type column displays either of the 3 data-items namely "Therapy" or "Medication" or "Therapy & Medication", "Meds".
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity

steps.action: Observe the "Referral Type" column present after "Patient Name" column.
steps.expected_result: "Referral Type" must contain single record of Referral Type for each patient namely "Therapy" or "Medication" or "Therapy & Medication".

cases.title: Referral Type column > Empty field must display "N/A"
cases.description: Validating that empty field in "Referral Type" column is displayed as "N/A"
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity

steps.action: Observe the data from "Referral Type" column
steps.expected_result: Empty fields in "Referral Type" column must be displayed as "N/A".

cases.title: Referral Type filter drop down > Placement
cases.description: Verifying that "Select Referral Type" filter drop down is located after "Select Payer" dropdown filter & before "Select Referral Date Range" filter drop down.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Observe "Select Referral Type" filter drop down
steps.expected_result: "Select Referral Type" filter drop down must be located between "Search by patient name" search bar & "Select Payer" filter drop down.

cases.title: Referral Type filter drop down > Heading
cases.description: Checking that "Referral Type" filter drop down have heading (placeholder text) as "Select Referral Type"
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Observe the Referral Type filter drop down present after "Search by patient name" search bar
steps.expected_result: Referral Type drop down filter must have heading (placeholder text) as "Select Referral Type"

cases.title: "Select Referral Type" > drop down options
cases.description: Ensuring that "Select Referral Type" drop down contain options like "MED", "MEDS", "MED & THERAPY", "THERAPY".
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down
steps.expected_result: On click "Select Referral Type" filter drop down must appear with options in order as "MED", "MEDS", "MED & THERAPY", "THERAPY".

cases.title: "Select Referral Type" > Selecting on particular option must sort the Referral List accordingly
cases.description: Validating that clicking on particular option from "Select Referral Type" must sort the "Referral List" according to the selected option.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Navigate to the "Referral List" page on Wellity portal
Click on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down
Click on "Therapy" option from drop down
steps.expected_result: Referral List records must be sorted according to selected drop down option & only records with "Therapy" as Referral Type must be displayed. (Expected same for Medication, Therapy & Medication)

cases.title: "Select Referral Type" > Ensuring no issues with other filter combinations
cases.description: Ensuring that the "Select Referral Type" drop down filter works in combination with other filters like patient name, payer, and date range.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to the Wellity portal

steps.action: Navigate to the "Referral List" page on Wellity portal
Click on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down
Click on "Therapy" option from "Select Referral Type" filter drop down
Click on "Select Payer" filter drop down
Click on "AA" option from "Select Payer" filter drop down
steps.expected_result: The "Select Referral Type" drop down filter must work in combination with "Select Payer" filter drop down with selected options. (Expected same no default working for combinations with filters like patient name, date range as well).

cases.title: Referral Type > Access to Admin & Super admin
cases.description: Ensuring that both Referral Type column & "Select Referral Type" filter drop down has access to view & use for Admin & Super admin
cases.preconditions: Admin user must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Navigate to the "Referral List" page on Wellity portal
Observe whether Referral Type column is visible & contains data in it
Click on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down & click on "Therapy" option
Check whether patient records are sorted according to selected filter
steps.expected_result: Admin must be able to use (perform actions) on "Select Referral Type" filter drop down & view Referral Type column.

steps.action: Perform same actions by logging in as Super admin

cases.title: Referral Type column > Placement
cases.description: Verifying that "Referral Type" column is located after "Referral Date" column on "Referral List" page
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal

steps.action: Navigate to the "Referral List" page in Wellity portal

steps.expected_result: "Referral Type" column must be present after "Patient Name" column on "Referral List" page.

cases.title: "Select Referral Type" > filter drop down supports multi-select and displays correct options
cases.description: Ensure that the "Select Referral Type" filter dropdown allows multiple selections and contains the correct options "Therapy", "Medication", "Therapy & Medication", "Meds".
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to the Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on "Select Referral Type" multiselect filter dropdown
steps.expected_result:
On click, the dropdown should appear with options in order:

**"Therapy", "Medication", "Therapy & Medication"**

steps.action: Observe whether the filter applies to the "Referral List" based on the selected options.
steps.expected_result:
1. "Referral List" must be sorted according to the selected options.
2. Options should stay selected unless explicitly removed or cleared

cases.title: "Select Referral Type" > deselect single and all options
cases.description: Ensure that the "Select Referral Type" dropdown allows to remove selected options individually or all at once and that the filter resets accordingly.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to the Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on the "Select Referral Type" filter dropdown
Deselect one of the selected option
steps.expected_result: Selected option should be **individually deselect**

steps.action: Observe that the deselected option is removed from the filter
steps.expected_result: Once deselected, the dropdown should return to **empty** state
Filter results should update accordingly (show unfiltered or default data)

cases.title: "Select Payer" > filter drop down supports multi-select and displays correct options
cases.description: Ensure that the "Select Payer" filter dropdown allows multiple selections and contains the correct options "AA", "CCHP", "CCAH", "Carelon", "VHP", "SCFHP".
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to the Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on the "Select Payer" multiselect filter dropdown
steps.expected_result:
On click, the dropdown should appear with options in order:

 "AA", "CCHP", "CCAH", "Carelon", "VHP", "SCFHP"

steps.action: Observe whether the filter applies to the "Referral List" based on the selected options.
steps.expected_result:
1. "Referral List" must be sorted according to the selected options.
2. Options should stay selected unless explicitly removed or cleared

cases.title: "Select Payer" > deselect single and all options
cases.description: Ensure that the "Select Payer" dropdown allows to remove selected options individually or all at once and that the filter resets accordingly.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to the Wellity portal

steps.action: Click on the "Select Payer" filter dropdown
Deselect one of the selected options(e.g- unchecked "VHP")
steps.expected_result: User should be able to **deselect any single selected payer**

steps.action: Observe that the deselected option("VHP") is removed from the filter
steps.expected_result: After deselection, the dropdown should reflect updated selections or empty state
Filter results should update accordingly (show unfiltered or default data)

cases.title: Sync Now > Success message
cases.description: Success toaster message must appear on successful manual sync with text "Patient records synced successfully.".
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal.

steps.action: Click on "Sync Now" (top-right corner) from "Referral List" page.
steps.expected_result: A success toaster message must appear on successful sync with text "Patient records synced successfully.".

cases.title: Sync Now > Failed message
cases.description: Toaster message with text "Failed to sync patient records. Please try again." must be displayed on fail of "Sync Now" button.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal.

steps.action: Click on "Sync Now" button from "Referral List" page.
steps.expected_result: When patient records are failed to sync, a toaster message must be displayed with the text "Failed to sync patient records. Please try again.".

cases.title: Sync Now > Disable button during sync with loading state & disabled cursor
cases.description: Ensuring that "Sync Now" button must be disabled when "Sync Now" button is clicked with disabled cursor & in loading state.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity portal with authorizatiom

steps.action: Navigate to "Referral List" page in left-navigation panel.
Click on "Sync Now" button present in the top-right corner of "Referral List" page.
steps.expected_result: "Sync Now" button must start with the action of loading & should be disabled until the Sync is completed.

cases.title: [Functional] Display filters with correct sequence & options
cases.description: Ensuring that all the filters on the "Referral List" are displayed sequentially with appropriate options.
cases.preconditions: User must be logged in to Wellity with authorization.

steps.action: Observe the filters in the top of "Referral List" page.
steps.expected_result: "Search by patient name" search bar, "Select payer", "Select referral type", "Select referral date range" drop down filters must be displayed with correct options.
